GSP33brssbh4u:220: nanu śāstraprāmāṇyāt anāśaṅkanīyaḥ atra pratyavāya prasaṅgo na ca lokikena nyāyena śāstrīyā dṛṣṭiḥ niyantuṃ yukta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:221: atra ucyate - nirdhārite śāstrārtha etat evaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:222: saṃdigdhe tu tasmin nirṇayaṃ prati lokikaḥ api nyāya āśrīyanāṇo na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:223: tena ca utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭi adhyāse śāstrārthe avadhāryamāṇe nikṛṣṭadṛṣṭim adhyasyan pratyaveyāt iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:224: prāthamyāt ca ādityādi śabdānāṃ mukhyārthatvam avirodhāt gṛhītavyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:225: taiḥ svārthavṛttibhiḥ avaruddhāyāṃ buddhau paścāt avatarato brahmaśabdasya mukhyayā vṛttyā sāmānādhikaraṇya asaṃbhavāt brahmadṛṣṭividhānārthata eva avatiṣṭhate /
GSP33brssbh4u:226: itiparatvāt api brahmaśabdasya eṣa eva artho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:227: tathā hi 'brahmetyādeśaḥ' 'brahmetyupāsīta' 'brahametyupāste' iti ca sarvatra itiparaṃ brahmaśabdam uccārayati śuddhān tu ādityādi śabdān /
GSP33brssbh4u:228: tata- ca yathā śuktikāṃ rajatam iti pratyeti ityatra śuktivacana eva
GSP33brssbh4u:229: śuktikā śabdo rajataśabdaḥ tu rajatapratīti lakṣaṇārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:230: pratyetyeva hi kevalaṃ rajatam iti na tu tatra rajatam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:231: evam atra api ādityādīn brahma iti pratīyāt iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:232: vākyaśeṣaḥ api ca dvitīyānirdeśena ādityādīneva upāstikriyayā vyāpyamānān darśayati - 'sa ya etamevaṃ vidvānādityaṃ brahmetyupāste' (chā. 3.19.4),
GSP33brssbh4u:235: yat tu uktaṃ brahma upāsanām eva atra ādaraṇīyaṃ phalatvāya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:237: uktena nyāyena ādityādīnām eva upāsyatva avagamāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:238: phalaṃ tu atithyādi upāsana iva ādityādi upāsane 'pi brahma eva dāsyati
GSP33brssbh4u:240: varṇitaṃ ca etat 'phalamata upapatteḥ' (bra.sū. 3.2.38) iti atra /
GSP33brssbh4u:241: īdṛśaṃ ca atra brahmaṇa upāsyatvaṃ yat pratīkeṣu tat dṛṣṭi adhyāropaṇaṃ pratimādiṣu iva viṣṇu ādīnām // 5 //
GSP33brssbh4u:247: 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1) iti evamādiṣu aṅgāvabaddheṣu upāsaneṣu saṃśayaḥ kim ādityādiṣu udgīthādi dṛṣṭayo vidhīyante kiṃ vā udgīthādiṣu eva ādityādi dṛṣṭaya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:248: tatra aniyamo niyamakāraṇa abhāvāt iti prāptam /
GSP33brssbh4u:249: na hi atra brahmaṇa iva kasyacit utkarṣaviśeṣaḥ avadhāryate 'brahma hi samasta jagat kāraṇatvāt apahatapāpmatvādi guṇayogāt ca ādityādibhya utkṛṣṭam iti śakyam avadhārayituṃ na tu āditya udgīthādīnāṃ vikāratva
GSP33brssbh4u:250: aviśeṣāt kañcit utkarṣaviśeṣa avadhāraṇe kāraṇam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:254: udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmātmakāḥ santaḥ phalahetavo bhaviṣyanti /
GSP33brssbh4u:255: tathā ca 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma'(chā. 1.6.1) iti atra 'tadetadetasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1) iti ṛkśabdena pṛthivīṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:256: nirdiśati sāmaśabdena agniṃ tat ca pṛthivi agnyoḥ rṛk sāmadṛṣṭicīkīrṣāyām avakalpate na ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivi agnidṛṣṭi cikīrṣāyām /
GSP33brssbh4u:257: kṣattari hi rājadṛṣṭikaraṇāt rājaśabda upacaryate na rājani kṣattṛśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:258: api ca 'lokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.2.1) iti adhikaraṇanirdeśāt lokeṣu sāma adhyasitavyam iti pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:259: 'etadgāyatraṃ prāṇeṣu protam' (chā. 2.11.1) iti ca etadevaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:260: prathamanirdiṣṭeṣu ca ādityādiṣu caramanirdiṣṭaṃ brahma adhyastam 'ādityo
GSP33brssbh4u:264: ataḥ anaṅgeṣu ādityādiṣu aṅgam atinikṣepa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:265: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ādityādimataya eva aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran /
GSP33brssbh4u:267: upapadyate hi evam apūrvasaṃnikarṣāt ādityādimatibhiḥ saṃskriyamāṇeṣu udgīthādiṣu karmasamṛddhiḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:268: 'yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'
GSP33brssbh4u:270: bhavatu karmasamṛddhiphaleṣu evaṃ, svatantraphaleṣu tu katham 'ya etadevaṃ vidvāṃllokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāste' (chā. 2.2.3) ityādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:271: teṣu api adhikṛta adhikārāt prakṛta apūrvasaṃnikarṣeṇa eva phalakalpanā yuktā godohanādīniyamavat
GSP33brssbh4u:272: phalātmakatvāt ca ādityādīnām udgīthādibhyaḥ karmātmakebhya utkarṣa upapattiḥ ādityādiprāptilakṣaṇaṃ hi karmaphalaṃ śiṣyate śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh4u:275: iti ca udgīthameva upāsyatvena upakramya ādityādimatīḥ vidadhāti /
GSP33brssbh4u:276: yat tu uktam udgīthādimatibhiḥ upāsyamānā ādityādayaḥ karmabhūyaṃ bhūtvā phalaṃ kariṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:279: ādityādibhāvena api ca dṛśyamānānām udgīthādīnāṃ karmātmakatvān apāyāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:280: 'tadetadetasyāmṛcyadhyūḍhaṃ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1) iti tu lākṣaṇika eva pṛthivī agnyoḥ ṛk sāmaśabdaprayogaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:281: lakṣaṇā ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭena viprakṛṣṭena vā svārthasaṃbandhena pravartate /
GSP33brssbh4u:282: tatra yadi api ṛk sāmayoḥ pṛthivī agnyoḥ ca saṃnidhānayoreva eṣa ṛk sāmaśabdaprayoga ṛk sāmasaṃbandhāt iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:283: kṣattṛśabdaḥapi hi kutaścit kāraṇāt rājānam upasarpan na nivārayituṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssbh4u:284: 'iyamevarka'(chā. 1.6.1) iti ca yathā akṣaranyāsam ṛca eva pṛthivītvam avadhārayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:285: pṛthivyā hi aktve avadhāryamāṇa iyam ṛk eva ityakṣaranyāsaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:286: 'ya evaṃ vidvānsāma gāyati' (chā. 1.7.7) iti ca aṅgāśrayameva vijñānam upasaṃharati na pṛthivyādi āśrayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:287: tathā 'lokeṣu pañcavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.2.1) iti yadi api
GSP33brssbh4u:288: saptamīnirdiṣṭā lokāḥ tathāpi sāmnyeva te adhyasyeran dvitīyānirdeśena sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt
GSP33brssbh4u:289: sāmani hi lokeṣu adhyasyamāneṣu sāma lokātmana upāsitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:290: anyathā punaḥ lokāḥ sāmā ātmana upāsitāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:292: yatra api tulyo dvitīyanirdeśaḥ - 'atha khalvamumādityaṃ saptavidhaṃ sāmopāsīta' (chā. 2.9.1) iti, tatra api 'samastasya khalu sāmna upāsanaṃ
GSP33brssbh4u:294: saptavidhasya' (chā. 2.8.1) iti ca sāmna eva upāsyatva upakramāt tasmin eva ādityādi adhyāsaḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:295: etasmāt eva ca sāmna upāsyatva avagamāt 'pṛthivī hiṅkāraḥ' (chā. 2.2.1)
GSP33brssbh4u:296: ityādinirdeśaviparyaye api hiṅkārādiṣu eva pṛthivyādi dṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:297: tasmāt anaṅgāśrayā ādityādimatayaḥ aṅgeṣu udgīthādiṣu kṣipyeran iti siddham // 6 //
GSP33brssbh4u:301: karmāṅgasaṃbaddheṣu tāvat upāsaneṣu karmatantratvāt na āsanādicintā na api samyak darśane vastutantratvāt vijñānasya /
GSP33brssbh4u:302: itareṣu tu upāsaneṣu kim aniyamena tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayāno vā pravarteta uta niyamena āsīna eva iti cintayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:303: tatra mānasatvāt upāsanasya aniyamaḥ śarīrasthiteḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:304: evaṃ prāpte bravīti - āsīna eva upāsīta iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:306: upāsanaṃ nāma samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇaṃ na ca tat gacchato dhāvato vā saṃbhavati gatyādīnāṃ cittavikṣepakatvāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:307: tiṣṭhataḥ api dehadhāraṇe vyāpṛtaṃ mano na sūkṣmavastunirīkṣaṇakṣamaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:308: śayānasya api akasmāt eva nidrayā abhibhūyeta /
GSP33brssbh4u:309: āsīnasya tu evañjātīyako bhūyān doṣaḥ suparihara iti saṃbhavati tasya upāsanam // 7 //
GSP33brssbh4u:311: api ca dhyāyati arthaṃ eṣa yat samānapratyayapravāhakaraṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:312: dhyāyatiḥ ca praśithila aṅgaceṣṭeṣu pratiṣṭhitadṛṣṭiṣu ekaviṣaya ākṣiptacitteṣu upacaryamāṇo dṛśyate dhyāyati bako dhyāyati proṣitabandhuḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:316: api ca 'dhyāyatīva pṛthivī' (chā. 7.6.1) iti atra pṛthivyādiṣu
GSP33brssbh4u:317: acalatvameva apekṣya dhyāyativādo bhavati tat ca liṅgam upāsanasya āsīnakarmatve // 9 //
GSP33brssbh4u:319: smaranti api ca śiṣṭā upāsana aṅgatvena āsanam - 'śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiramāsanamātmanaḥ' (gī. 6.11) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh4u:320: ata eva padmakādīnām āsanaviśeṣāṇām upadeśo yogaśāstre // 10 //
GSP33brssbh4u:324: dik deśakāleṣu saṃśayaḥ - kim asti kaścit niyamo na asti vā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:325: prāyeṇa vaidikeṣu ārambheṣu digādiniyamadarśanāt syāt iha api kaścit niyama iti yasya matiḥ taṃ prati āha dik deśakāleṣu arthalakṣaṇa eva niyamaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:326: yatra eva asya diśi deśe kāle vā manasaḥ sokaryeṇa ekāgratā bhavati tatra eva upāsīta prācīdik pūrvāhna prācīna pravaṇādivat viśeṣa aśrāvaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:328: nanu viśeṣam api kecit āmananti - 'same śucau kharkarāvahnivālukāvivarjite śabdajalāśrayādibhiḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:329: manonukūle natu cakṣupīḍane guhānivātāśrayaṇe prayojayet' (śve. 2.10) iti yathā iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:331: sati tu etasmin tadgateṣu viśeṣaniyama iti suhṛt bhūtvā ācārya ācaṣṭe /
GSP33brssbh4u:332: 'manonukūle' iti ca eṣā śrutiḥ yatra ekāgratā tatra eva iti etat eva darśayati // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:336: āvṛttiḥ sarva upāsaneṣu ādartavya iti sthitam ādye adhikaraṇe /
GSP33brssbh4u:337: tatra yāni tāvat samyak darśanārthāni upāsanāni tāni avaghātādivat kāryaparyavasānāni iti jñātameva eṣām āvṛttiparimāṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:338: na hi samyak darśane kārye niṣpanne yatnāntaraṃ kiñcit śāsituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh4u:340: yāni punaḥ abhyudayaphalāni teṣu eṣā cintā kiṃ kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam āvartya uparamet uta yāvajjīvam āvartayet iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:342: kiyantañcit kālaṃ pratyayam abhyasya utsṛjet āvṛttiviśiṣṭasya upāsanaśabdārthasya kṛtatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:343: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - āprāyaṇāt eva āvartayet pratyayam /
GSP33brssbh4u:345: karmāṇi api hi janmāntara upabhogyaṃ phalam ārabhamāṇāni tat anurūpaṃ bhāvanāvijñānaṃ prāyaṇakāla ākṣipanti, 'savijñāno bhavati
GSP33brssbh4u:346: savijñānamevānvavakrāmati' 'yaccittastenaiṣa prāṇamāyāti, prāṇastejasā yuktaḥ sahātmanā yathāsaṃkalpitaṃ lokaṃ nayati' iti ca evamādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:348: pratyayāḥ tu ete svarūpa anuvṛttiṃ muktvā kim anyat prāyaṇakālabhāvi bhāvanāvijñānam apekṣeran
GSP33brssbh4u:349: tasmāt ye pratipattavyaphalabhāvanātmakāḥ pratyayaḥ teṣu aprāyaṇāt āvṛttiḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:350: tathā ca śrutiḥ -'sa yāvatkraturayamasmāllokātpraiti' iti prāyaṇakāle api
GSP33brssbh4u:352: smṛtiḥ api - 'yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaranbhāvaṃ tyajatyante kalevaram /
GSP33brssbh4u:353: taṃ tamevaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ' (gī. 8.6) iti 'prayāṇakāle
GSP33brssbh4u:355: 'so 'ntavelāyāmetattrayaṃ pratipadyeta' iti ca maraṇavelāyām api kartavyaśeṣaṃ śrāvayati // 9 tat adhigama adhikaraṇam /
GSP33brssbh4u:359: atha idānīṃ brahmavidyāphalaṃ prati cintā pratāyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:360: brahma adhigame sati tat viparītaphalaṃ duritaṃ kṣīyate na kṣīyate vā iti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:362: phalārthatvāt karmaṇaḥ phalam adatvā na saṃbhāvyate kṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:363: phaladāyinī hi asya śaktiḥ śrutyā samadhigatā /
GSP33brssbh4u:364: yadi tadantareṇa eva phala upabhogam apavṛjyeta śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:366: nanu evaṃ sati prāyaścitta upadeśaḥanarthakaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh4u:369: api ca prāyaścittānāṃ doṣasaṃyogena vidānāt bhavet api doṣakṣapaṇārthatā na tu evaṃ brahmavidyāyāṃ vidhānam asti /
GSP33brssbh4u:370: nanu anabhyupagamyamāne brahmavidaḥ karmakṣaye tatphalasya avaśyaṃ bhoktavyatāvāt anirmokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:373: tasmāt na brahma adhigame duritanivṛttiḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:374: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- tat adhigame brahma adhigame sati uttarapūrvayoḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:375: aghayoḥ aśleṣavināśau bhavataḥ uttarasya aśleṣaḥ pūrvasya vināśaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:378: tathā hi brahmavidyā prakriyāyāṃ saṃbhāvyamānasaṃbandhasya āgāmino duritasya anabhisaṃbandhaṃ viduṣo vyapadiśati - 'yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā.4.14.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:379: tathā vināśam api pūrva ucitasya duritasya vyapadiśati -
GSP33brssbh4u:380: 'tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante' (chā. 5.24.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:383: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (mu. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:384: yat uktam anupabhuktaphalasya karmaṇaḥ kṣayakalpanāyāṃ śāstraṃ kadarthitaṃ syāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:386: na hi vayaṃ karmaṇaḥ phaladāyinīṃ śaktim avajānīmahe, vidyata eva sā, sā tu vidyādinā kāraṇāntareṇa pratibadhyata iti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:387: śaktisadbhāvamātre ca śāstraṃ vyāpriyate na pratibandha apratibandhayoḥ api /
GSP33brssbh4u:388: na hi karma kṣīyata iti etat api smaraṇam autsargikaṃ na bhogāt ṛte karma kṣīyata tadarthatvāt iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:389: iṣyata eva tu prāyaścittādinā tasya kṣayaḥ 'sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati'
GSP33brssbh4u:390: 'tarati brahmahatyāṃ yo 'śvamedhena yajate ya u cainameva vada' ityādi śrutismṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:391: yat tu uktaṃ naimittikāni prāyaścittāni bhaviṣyanti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:393: doṣasaṃyogena codyamānānām eṣāṃ doṣanirghātaphalasaṃbhave phalāntarakalpanā anupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:394: yatpunaḥ etat uktaṃ na prāyaścittavat doṣakṣaya uddeśena vidyāvidānam asti iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:395: atra brūmaḥ - saguṇāsu tāvat vidyāsu vidyata eva vidhānam /
GSP33brssbh4u:396: tāsu ca vākyaśeṣa aiśvaryaprāptiḥ pāpanivṛttiḥ ca vidyāvata ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:397: tayoḥ ca avivakṣākāraṇaṃ na asti iti ataḥ pāpmaprahāṇapūrvaka aiśvaryaprāptiḥ tāsāṃ phalam iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:398: nirguṇāyāṃ tu vidyāyāṃ yadi api vidhānaṃ na asti tathā api akartṛ ātmatvabodhāt karmapradāhasiddhiḥ
GSP33brssbh4u:399: aśleṣa iti ca āgāmiṣu karmasu kartṛtvameva na pratipadyate brahmavit iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh4u:400: atikrānteṣu tu yadi api mithyājñānāt kartṛtvaṃ pratipeda iva tathā api vidyāsāmarthyāt mithyājñānanivṛtteḥ tāni api pravilīyanta iti āha vināśa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:401: pūrvasiddhakartṛtva bhoktṛtva viparītaṃ hi triṣu api kāleṣu akartṛtva abhoktṛtvasvarūpaṃ brahma aham asmi na itaḥ pūrvam api kartā bhoktā vā aham āsaṃ na idānīṃ na api bhaviṣyatkāla iti brahmavit avagacchati /
GSP33brssbh4u:403: anyathā hi anādikālapravṛttānāṃ karmāṇāṃ kṣayābhāve mokṣa abhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:404: na ca deśakālanimittāpekṣo mokṣaḥ karmaphalavat bhavitum arhati /
GSP33brssbh4u:407: tasmāt brahma adhigame duritakṣaya iti sthiram // 13 //

GSP33brssbh4u:650: aviruddhān dehabījabhūtāni bhūtasūkṣmāṇi āśritya karmaprayukto dehagrahaṇam anubhavituṃ saṃsarati

GSP33brssbh4u:687: 'athākāmayamāno yo 'kāmo niṣkāma āptakāma ātmakāmo bhavati na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti brahmaiva sanbrahmāpyeti' (bṛ. 4.4.6) iti ataḥ paravidyāviṣayāt
GSP33brssbh4u:688: pratiṣedhāt na parabrahmavido dehāt prāṇānām utkrāntiḥ asti iti cet /

GSP33brssbh4u:693: saṃbandhasāmānyaviṣayā hi ṣaṣṭhī śākhāntaragatayā pañcamyā saṃbandhaviśeṣe vyavasthāpyate
GSP33brssbh4u:694: tasmāt iti ca prādhānyāt abhyudayaniḥśreyasa adhikṛto dehī saṃbadhyate na dehaḥ /
GSP33brssbh4u:696: tasmāt uccikramiṣoḥ jīvāt prāṇā apakrāmanti saha eva tena bhavanti iti arthaḥ // 12 //

GSP33brssbh4u:757: tasya upasaṃhṛtavāgādi kalāpasya uccikramiṣato vijñānātmana oka āyatanaṃ hṛdayam 'sa etāstejomātrāḥ samabhyādadāno hṛdayamevānvavakrāmati' iti śruteḥ /

GSP33brssbh4u:791: sṛptā ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminnāditye sṛptāḥ' (chā. 8.6.2)
GSP33brssbh4u:792: iti nidāghasamaye ca niśāsu api kiraṇa anuvṛttiḥ upalabhyate pratāpādikāryadarśanāt /

GSP33brssbh4u:797: atha tu vidvān api rātriprāyaṇa aparādhamātreṇa na ūrdhvam ākrameta pākṣikaphalā vidyā iti apravṛttiḥ eva tasyāṃ syāt /

GSP33brssbh4u:1272: yathādarśanam eva ca phalaṃ yuktaṃ tatkratu nyāyāt /

GSP33brssbh4u:1290: tathā 'sa tatra paryeti jakṣankrīḍanramamāṇaḥ' (chā. 8.12.3) iti aiśvaryarūpam āvedayati /

GSP33brssbh4u:1294: yadyapi apahapāpmatvādayobhedena eva dharmā nirdiśyante tathā api śabdavikalpajā eva ete /

GSP33brssbh4u:1298: satyakāmatvādayaḥ tu yadi api vastusvarūpeṇa eva dharmā ucyante satyāḥ kāmā asya iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1299: tathā api upādhisaṃbandha adhīnatvāt teṣāṃ na caitanyavat svarūpasaṃbhavaḥ /

GSP33brssbh4u:1311: hārdavidyāyāṃ śrūyate - 'sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti' (chā. 8.2.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh4u:1312: tatra saṃśayaḥ kiṃ saṃkalpa eva kevalaḥ pitrādisamutthāne hetuḥ uta nimittāntara sahita iti
GSP33brssbh4u:1313: tatra sati api saṃkalpādeva iti śravaṇe lokavat nimittāntara apekṣatā yuktā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1314: yathā loke asmadādīnāṃ saṃkalpāt gamanādibhyaḥ ca hetubhyaḥ pitrādi saṃpattiḥ bhavati evaṃ muktasya api syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1316: saṃkalpādeva iti tu rājña iva saṃkalpitārthasiddhikarīṃ sādhanāntarasāmagrīṃ sulabhām apekṣya ucyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1317: na ca saṃkalpamātrasam utthānāḥ pitrādayo manorathāvijṛmbhitavat calatvāt puṣkalaṃ bhogaṃ samarpayituṃ paryāptāḥ syuḥ iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1318: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ saṃkalpādeva tu kevalāt pitrādisamutthānam iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1322: nimittāntaram api tu yadi saṃkalpa anuvidhāyi eva syāt bhavatu na tu prayatnāntarasaṃpādyaṃ nimittāntaram iti iṣyate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1324: na ca śruti avagamye arthe lokavat iti sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ kramate /
GSP33brssbh4u:1325: saṃkalpabalāt eva ca eṣāṃ yāvat prayojanaṃ sthairya upapattiḥ.
GSP33brssbh4u:1328: ata eva ca avandhyasaṃkalpatvāt ananya adhipatiḥ vidvān bhavati na asya anyaḥ adhipatiḥ bhavati ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brssbh4u:1337: śarīra indriyāṇi punaḥ prāpta aiśvaryasya viduṣaḥ santi na vā santi iti samīkṣyate /

GSP33brssbh4u:1344: jaiminiḥ tu ācāryo manovat śarīrasya api sendriyasya bhāvaṃ muktaṃ prati manyate /

GSP33brssbh4u:1346: na hi anekavidhatā vinā śarīrabhedena āñjasī syāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1347: yadi api nirguṇāyāṃ bhūmavidyāyām ayam anekadhā abhāvavikalpaḥ paṭhyate tathā api vidyamānameva idaṃ saguṇāvasthāyām aiśvaryaṃ bhūmavidyā stutaye saṃkīrtyata iti ataḥ saguṇavidyāphalabhāvena upatiṣṭhata iti // 11 //
GSP33brssbh4u:1350: bādarāyaṇaḥ punaḥ ācāryaḥ ata eva ubhayaliṅgaśrutidarśanāt ubhayavidhatvaṃ sādhu manyate yadā saśarīratāṃ saṃkalpayati tadā saśarīro bhavati yadā tu aśarīratāṃ tadā aśarīra iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1354: yathā dvādaśa ahaḥsatram ahīnaḥ ca bhavati /

GSP33brssbh4u:1363: tatra tridhābhāvādiṣu anekaśarīrasarge kiṃ nirātmakāni śarīrāṇi dāruyantrāṇi iva sṛjyante kiṃ vā sātmakāni asmadādi śarīravat iti bhavati vīkṣā /
GSP33brssbh4u:1364: tatra ca ātma manasoḥ bheda anupapatteḥ ekena śarīreṇa yogāt itarāṇi śarīrāṇi nirātmakāni iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1365: evaṃ prāpte pratipadyate - pradīpavat āveśa iti /
GSP33brssbh4u:1366: yathā pradīpa ekaḥ anekapradīpabhāvam āpadyate vikāraśaktiyogāt /
GSP33brssbh4u:1367: evam ekaḥ api san vidvāna aiśvaryayogāt anekabhāvam āpadya sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi āviśati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1368: kutaḥ, tathā hi darśayati śāstram ekasya anekabhāvam - 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā saptadhā navadhā' (chā. 7.26.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh4u:1369: na etat dāruyantra upamā abhyupagame avakalpate na api jīvāntarāveśe /
GSP33brssbh4u:1370: na ca nirātmakānāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh4u:1371: yat tu ātma manasoḥ bheda anupapatteḥ anekaśarīrayoga asaṃbhava iti /

GSP33brssbh4u:1428: 'na tadbhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅ ko na pāvakaḥ' (gī. 15.6) iti ca /

GSP33brssbh4u:1431: itaḥ ca na niraṅ kuśaṃ vikāra ālambanānām aiśvaryaṃ yasmāt bhogamātram eva eṣām anādisiddhena īśvareṇa samānam iti śrūyate - 'tamāhāpo vai khalu mīyante loko 'sau' iti 'sa yathaitāṃ devatāṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavantyevaṃ haivaṃvidaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtānyavanti teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati'(bṛ. 1.5.23) ityādibhedavyapadeśaliṅgebhyaḥ // 21 //
